scripts.compile-all: npm run compile-distrib && npm run compile-reseller && npm run compile-token && npm run compile-treasure
scripts.compile-distrib: FMT=PRETTY node cli.js contracts/Distribution.sol Distribution > dist/distrib.json
scripts.compile-token: FMT=PRETTY node cli.js contracts/Token.sol Token > dist/token.json
scripts.compile-treasure: FMT=PRETTY node cli.js contracts/Treasure.sol Treasure > dist/treasure.json
scripts.compile-reseller: FMT=PRETTY node cli.js contracts/Reseller.sol Reseller > dist/reseller.json
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run create && npm run compile-all
